definition[0]_en: An extension plan for a work that is intended to be realized by one or more distinct expressions that are all embodied simultaneously.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An extension plan for a work that is intended to be realized by one or more distinct expressions that are all embodied simultaneously.
scope note[0]_en: Includes poems, photographs, and completed novels.

definition[0]_en: An extension plan for a work that is intended to be realized by one distinct expression that is embodied during a closed timespan.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An extension plan for a work that is intended to be realized by one distinct expression that is embodied during a closed timespan.
scope note[0]_en: Includes project wikis, and conference websites.

definition[0]_en: An extension plan for a work that is intended to be realized by one distinct expression that is embodied during an open timespan.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An extension plan for a work that is intended to be realized by one distinct expression that is embodied during an open timespan.
scope note[0]_en: Includes updated standards, laws, and wikis.

definition[0]_en: An extension plan for a work that is intended to be realized by multiple distinct expressions that are embodied during a closed timespan.
ToolkitDefinition_en: An extension plan for a work that is intended to be realized by multiple distinct expressions that are embodied during a closed timespan.
scope note[0]_en: Includes serialized versions of novels, dictionaries, and reference works.

definition[0]_en: An extension plan for a work that is intended to be realized by multiple distinct expressions that are embodied during an open timespan,
ToolkitDefinition_en: An extension plan for a work that is intended to be realized by multiple distinct expressions that are embodied during an open timespan,
scope note[0]_en: Includes periodicals, newspapers, series, newsletters, conference proceedings, annual reports, and archived copies of webpages.
